title: ISic000173. Epitaph of Euodia
body:
Facsimile Images

Dis manibus
Euodia Saluta-
ri(s) filia vixit an-
nis III mensi-
5bus II

Apparatus criticus

Text of Ferrua

English translation

To the Shades of the Underworld. Euodia, daughter of Salutaris; she lived 3 years, 2 months.

commentary

The date proposed by Ferrua appears rather late, but the poor disposition of the text and the lack of abbreviation perhaps support the suggestion.

bibliography
